messages.subject: cartoon history of the Universe
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/13/03 7:23:47 AM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/13/03 7:23:47 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<<
Actually, that's only the first book. It goes from the big bang to
Alexander the Great, right? I have the second book that goes up to about
Roman times. Now I find there's at least one more. Yay! >>

Oh, ok. I wondered when it said Vol. 1-7, just exactly what that meant. It
goes to Athenian times so I guess I'll have to look for the rest now. :)

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
